prompt: Create a forgot password screen with futuristic dark theme and black background. Use Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.center and max width of 400. Display neon blue 'Reset Your Password' title, font size 28, bold. Add light gray subtitle saying 'Enter your email to receive a reset link.' Include TextField with neon blue border, 'Email' hint text, and cyan email prefix icon. Add full-width ElevatedButton with neon blue background, white 'Send Link' text, and rounded corners. Place cyan 'Back to Login' TextButton below. Use 24px padding and 18px spacing between elements.
